entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind south 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 41 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 05 January 2023
